description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger, from title of two first texts. Physical description: Writing is parallel to spine. 19 lines per page. Written in medium small naskh in black ink with use of red. Dark cream paper, soft, with laid and chain lines and pulp visible. European paper fly-leaves. Marginal annotations by later hands (partly cut off due to the trimming of the pages). Some leaves are misplaced (see beginning of the fourth maqālah of Fuṣūl Abuqrāṭ on fol. 15a). Fol. 63 consists of two leaves pasted on one other, with inscriptions visible on the pasted side of the leaves. Pagination using Arabic numerals (starts with "3" on fol. 1). Inscriptions on the recto and verso of the first flyleaf. Inscription mentioning Aḥmad al-Ḥusaynī on fol. 116a. Spine label (horizontal, partly wanting) with title, the extant part reading: "ṭibb wa-al-nujūm". Origin: The name of the copyist, place and date of copy appear in the colophon of item 13 (fol. 141b): copied by Ayyūb (or Abū?) ...? in Arzinjān [Erzincan] in the Madrasat al-...? in ...? (fol. 141b). The copy of item 5 is dated middle of Ṣafar 680 [1281] (fol. 57a).
abstract: Collection of texts on medicine, physics, and philosophy in Arabic and Persian. Rosa Kuhne Brabant gives a complete description of this ms. in her edition of the Kitāb al-Durī (al-Qantara 10 (1989), p. 315-316).
contents: 1. fol. 1a-20b: Fuṣūl Abuqrāṭ [aceph.]. -- Mach, R. Yahuda, 4773.
2. fol. 21a-23a: Faṣl fī qaḍāyā Buqrāṭ fī al-ʻalāmāt al-dāllah ʻalá al-mawt. -- Mach, R. Yahuda, 4774.
3. fol. 23a-24b: Faṣl fī al-buḥrān. -- Mach, R. Yahuda, 4781.

4. fol. 25a: [Short excerpt on death attributed to Aristotle, beginning with: "al-amwāt awlād al-amrāḍ", and a short text on a question of grammar, entitled "Takmilah fī al-naḥw", written by another hand].
5. fol. 25b-57a: [al-Qānūnchah fī al-ṭibb / al-Jaghmīnī] -- Mach, R. Yahuda, 4777.
6. fol. 57a: Duʻā Jibrīl [later hand].
6. fol. 57b-62a: al-Qawl fī al-ajnās al-ʻasharah min Kitāb al-Najāt / [Avicenna]. -- Mach, R. Yahuda, 3021.
7. fol. 62a-63a: al-Māʼ al-ikhtiyār [Excerpt from al-Qānūn fī al-ṭibb] / [Avicenna].
8. fol. 63b-88a: al-Masāʼil / Abū Sahl Saʻd [Saʻīd] ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Nīlī -- Mach, R. Yahuda, 4776.
9. fol. 88b-105a: [Sī faṣl / Naṣīr al-Dīn Ṭūsī].
10. fol. 105b-108a: Min Maqālat Fakhr al-Dīn al-Rāzī. -- In Persian.
11. fol. 108b-109a: [Short text] / ʻUbayd ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-ʻAjlī(?).
12. fol. 109b-113a: Qawl fī al-raʻd wa-al-burw min Kitāb al-Mulakhkhaṣ / [al-Jaghmīnī] -- Mach, R. Yahuda, 4874
13. fol. 113b-141b: [Treatise in ten chapters on astronomy, with diagrams]. -- In Persian.
14. fol. 142a-144a: al-Qawl fī al-jibāl wa-al-maʻādin min Kitāb al-Mulakhkhaṣ / al-Jaghmīnī -- Mach, R. Yahuda, 4874.
15. fol. 144b-146a: Min maqālat al-Shaykh al-ḥakīm Abī al-Majd Majdūd al-Sanāʼī. -- In Persian.
16. fol. 146b-157b: [Risālah fī ḥudūd al-ashyāʼ wa-rusūmihā] / Ibn Sīnā. -- Mach, R. Yahuda, 3012.
17. fol. 158a: [Definition of al-istiqrāʼ, beginning with: "huwa ithbāt al-ḥukm al-kullī bi-wāsiṭati thubūtihi fī baʻḍ al-afrād")].
18. fol. 158b-161a: Qawl fī maʻrifat quwá al-nafs min Kitāb al-Najāt / [Avicenna]. -- Mach, R. Yahuda, 3021
19. fol. 161a-162a: [Fāʼidah on astronomical questions regarding the seasons and on air].
19. fol. 162b-181a: Kitāb al-Tanqīḥāt. -- Mach, R. Yahuda, 3042.
20. fol. 181a-181b: [Short sayings attributed to wise men and shaykhs].
21. fol. 182a-183b: al-Qism al-thānī fīmā yaḥdathu ʻalá wajh al-arḍ wa-taḥtahā [incomplete at end].
extent: ii, 183, iii leaves: paper ; 112 x 158 (80 x 130) mm.
